scripts.setup:auth: cd auth-service && npm i && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && cd ..
scripts.setup:student: cd student-service && npm i && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && cd ..
scripts.setup:notification: cd notification-service && npm i && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && cd ..
scripts.setup: npm run setup:auth && npm run setup:student && npm run setup:notification && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:gateway
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:dev --prefix auth-service" "npm run start:dev --prefix notification-service" "npm run start:dev --prefix student-service" "npm run start:dev --prefix api-gateway" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: npm run db && npm run setup && npm run dev
